generic.serviceUnavailable: Service unavailable. Retry in a few minutes
generic.shutDown: The app will close soon due to the cost of maintaining the service. We are happy to say that CourseMatch has been used more than 70k times by Aalto students. We would love to hear your stories in using the app. Share them with us at late.truest0l@icloud.com. Please consider supporting us with a donation at https://ko-fi.com/matteo79894 if you enjoyed the service. We appreciate any amount you can donate. Thank you for using CourseMatch!

header.title: CourseMatch
header.infoText: CourseMatch is a recommender system based on the word embedding technique for course selection. It matches the user's course search with a database of course descriptions available through the Aalto API, and suggest the most relevant courses. It works with 50+ languages.

mainScreen.courseQueryTextPlaceholder: What would you like to learn today?
mainScreen.examplesTitle: Tell what you would like to learn or try an example
